thread.title: Lexington's Shields runs away with Gothenburg Invite
thread.title_full: Lexington's Shields runs away with Gothenburg Invite

author: DEREK NOEHREN dnoehren@nptelegraph.com
title: Lexington's Shields runs away with Gothenburg Invite
text:
Previous Next Lexington's Shields runs away with Gothenburg Invite 
JohnMark Shields, of Lexington, runs down the stretch toward the finish line as he wins the Gothenburg Cross Country Invite on Thursday at Wild Horse Golf Club in Gothenburg. (Derek Noehren / The North Platte Telegraph) Posted: Thursday, October 1, 2015 9:47 pm Lexington's Shields runs away with Gothenburg Invite By DEREK NOEHREN dnoehren@nptelegraph.com nptelegraph.com 
GOTHENBURG — After finishing second at the University of Nebraska at Kearney Invite on Monday, Lexington’s JohnMark Shields wanted to run a smarter race his next time out. 
That he did, winning the Gothenburg Invite in a time of 16 minutes, 34 seconds, beating out second place finisher Taye Collicott by a full 41 seconds on Thursday at Wild Horse Golf Club in Gothenburg.   Need an account? Create one now. Subscription required
